title: The Secretive World Of MEV, Where Bots Front-Run Crypto Investors For Big Profits
author: Jeff Kauflin
description: True believers say crypto is more transparent than traditional finance. Yet that openness—combined with clunky infrastructure and an absence of regulation–lets crypto trading firms with lightning-fast bots prey on unsuspecting retail traders.

title: Stakes Done? Coinbase Pressured To Halt Earnings Program In 4 States
author: Leeor Shimron
description: U.S. allegation that retail service is really a security provides catalyst for bans

title: Blockchain Interoperability: The Tab Switching Of Web 3.0
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: Learn how the web3 ecosystem works, and what the limitations are

title: From Hero To Zero: How Terra Was Toppled In Crypto’s Darkest Hour
author: Lawrence Wintermeyer
description: Sparked by the failure of Terra’s algorithmic stablecoin UST, a “death spiral” slashed the dollar-pegged asset to mere cents and saw the LUNA token hemorrhage 99 percent of its value. In crypto’s darkest hour LUNA’s demise has eclipsed Mt. Gox, BitConnect and the 2020 crash.

title: What The XRP Security Ruling Means For Bitcoin, Ethereum And BNB
author: Rufas Kamau
description: On Thursday July 13, US judge Analisa Torres of the U.S. District Court of the Southern District of New York ruled that Ripple Labs’ XRP token is a security when offer...

title: Liquid Staking: Crypto’s New Phantom Money Machine
author: Javier Paz
description: Coinbase, Binance and other exchanges hold at least $2.25 billion of shadow ether, as the latest lucrative innovation in digital assets ramps up.

title: In An Industry Where Network Is King, Solana Bets On Hacker Houses To Launch Them Ahead
author: Kamran Rosen
description: With the race on to rival Ethereum as the next big smart contract platform, Solana is ramping up its efforts on in-person Hacker Houses.

title: Despite Fears Of Huge Supply Unlock, Ethereum’s New Upgrade Propels It To New Highs
author: Leeor Shimron
description: Ethereum is finally allowing its stakers to withdrawal $35 billion in tokens from the network. However, more tokens are rushing in than pulling out.

title: Web3 - A Transformative And Disruptive Multi-Trillion-Dollar Opportunity To Service Billions
author: Roomy Khan
description: Web3 sector will grow at a roughly 50 percent compound annual growth rate (CAGR) to become a multi-trillion-dollar industry over the next decade. Web3 could go from a buzzword to mainstream, disrupting existing businesses while creating massive new markets.

title: The Queens Of Crypto: The VC Making A $100 Million Investment In Web3 Infrastructure
author: Amy Shoenthal
description: Crypto VC Emma Cui started her career in banking and now runs the leading web3 accelerator in all of Asia. She believes that now is an optimal time to invest in companies building the foundation that will shape the future of decentralized finance (DeFi.)

title: How Optimism’s Upgrade Will Shape The Future Of Ethereum
author: Eshita Nandini
description: Coinbase and Worldcoin are leading the charge in developing decentralized alternatives on Optimism's infrastructure, paving the way for other companies to address this...

title: What Happens To DYDX’s $335 Million Cryptocurrency When It Leaves Ethereum
author: Michael del Castillo
description: Decentralized exchange DYDX is about to move its platform from Ethereum to a Cosmos blockchain of it’s own creation. Before investors make the move, they should understand the process.

title: Understanding And Profiting From Proof-Of-Stake Cryptos
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: Learn the process of staking crypto and how to navigate the space

title: Crypto Market Shrinks 2% As SEC Opens Second Front In Exchange Crackdown
author: Maria Gracia Santillana Linares
description: Coinbase shares slide 15% after agency names company in civil complaint, a day after similar action against Binance.

title: Developers Are Still Flocking To Crypto Amid Its Brutal Winter
author: Maria Gracia Santillana Linares
description: Despite a rash of bankruptcies, hacks and dismal year for crypto prices, full-time open-source crypto developers reached an all-time high of 23,000 according to Electric Capital.

title: Ethereum, “The Merge”: What Developers Are Saying
author: Kenneth Rapoza
description: The new Ethereum is supposed to be faster, but not much cheaper anytime soon. That should keep the alternatives in business for longer.

title: US Treasury Sanctioning Tornado Cash Unleashes ‘Max Chaos’ In The Crypto Universe
author: Eric Mack
description: Treasury’s Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) added Tornado Cash and 45 associated Ethereum wallet addresses to its Specially Designated Nationals and Blocked Persons (SDN) list, which includes individuals or companies tied to sanctioned nations, as well as suspected terrorists.

title: What Is Proof Of Stake and What Should Investors Know?
author: Sean Stein Smith
description: Let’s take a look at what investors need to know about PoS
